official_title: A bill to define and clarify terms used in that patent from the United States dated June 29, 1911, granting certain lands to the State of Idaho.

summary.text: Permits the leasing of certain land for homesites and the granting of a limited number of float home permits in the Heyburn State Park of Idaho.

titles.title: A bill to define and clarify terms used in that patent from the United States dated June 29, 1911, granting certain lands to the State of Idaho.
